dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset generated from two towns in the CARLA simulator, consisting of 50 camera configurations with a total of 1,230,017 image pairs, used for evaluating camera calibration methods.
dcterms:title: CVGL Camera Calibration dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating cyclist detection methods, containing 2,914 images from real-world scenarios.
dcterms:title: Cyclist Detection dataset

dcterms:creator: Xiaofei Li

dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating methods in real-world scenarios, specifically for cyclist detection, containing images that were processed to derive right images using left and disparity images.
dcterms:title: Tsinghua-Daimler dataset
